item.title: English
item.description: 1- Reading Comprehension Readtheory and rhlschool - these are educational resources that offer online reading activities and skill-building exercises for all levels. BreakingNewsEnglish free English lessons in seven levels that are all based on current events in the news. Els-lounge free reading materials such as texts, stories, and passages, followed by questions, activities, or games to enhance comprehension. 2 - Listening Comprehension Stream and listen to Podcasts online at:
